subject: Missing items
description_text:
Hello,

Order #SSN2655. I believe I am missing items from my order. I ordered the
plus-x pedals with the haptics reactors. I did not receive the haptics
reactors in the packaging. Is there any support I could receive with this?

Thank you,
Logan Lohmar

conversations.body_text: It also appears after further inspection that there is no power cable for the hub that the pedals plug into.

Hi Logan Lohmar,  Hello, the VAM Pro units might have been shipped separately since they are usually packed individually. Could you please take a photo to confirm which power cable is missing — is it the USB cable, or the dedicated power cable for the VAM Pro vibration motor? This will help us arrange a replacement for you as quickly as possible.

Hello,

Thanks for that information. I see why I was given two different tracking
numbers now but the second one has not worked at all. These are both the
tracking numbers that were in the order email.

884362239740
SF6045916098461 - This is the one that does not work on Fedex's tracking
system so I really have no way of checking where it is.

As for the power cable, that is my mistake. I initially thought that the
pedal hub needed a dedicated power supply to operate the pedals and didn't
realize that it gets power by the USB cable which was in the packaging. I
do not have the power cable for the VAM Pro vibration motor but from your
email it sounds like it would be in the second missing package with the
haptics modules.

Apologies for the confusion and thank you for clearing some up for me.
Please let me know if there's anything else you need from me.

Thank you.



On Sun, Sep 21, 2025 at 5:26 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Logan Lohmar,     This  tracking number is valid, but we are sorry that we appear to have sent an incorrect link. You can click this link to track your shipment. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045916098461
